channel.title: Homepage – Spearmex
channel.description: Luxury Fishing & Spearfishing adventures in Punta Mita, Nayarit Mexico

item.title: The Ultimate 2 Day Offshore Adventure
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: One of a lifetime opportunity to enjoy 2 Days at a unique Offshore Islands, pristine enviroment for Spearfishing, Scuba Diving and empty waves for surfing! Catering a Gourmet experience on board in our Custom grill, a weekend full of adrenaline!
item.content:encoded:
Features:

  • Itinerary: Departure at 10:00 PM, plus 2 days at Offshore Lacation and returning at Sunset after dinner, arriving to the Marina in the following date for breakfast.
  • 2 days, 3 nights on board.
  • Airport Round Trip Transfers
  • Surfboards
  • Professional freediving/snorkel guide
  • Sportfishing & spearfishing gear provided
  • Scuba Diving available upon request for certified divers
  • Full Snorkel gear
  • Underwater photos and videos by GO PRO
  • All drinks and meals are included.
  • Camping setup available upon request for the night at the island
  • Live Bait and Fish Cleaning / Vacuum seal packaging available at additional cost
  • Safety gear on every boat (life jackets and marine first aid kit)

item.title: 3 DAY Blue Water Hunting Package
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description: Based on our many years of experience and seeing the success of our clients in blue water we consider 3 days as the ideal time investment in order to achieve your dreams of that One Fish!
item.content:encoded:
Includes:

  • 3 days of hunting offshore (10 hour trip per day)
  • Full RIFFE Gear
  • Professional Guide and Captain.
  • Live Bait
  • Fish cleaning
  • Food & Drinks Included.
  • Airport round trip transfers
  • Vacuum seal packaging available at additional cost*
  • Underwater photos
  • Extra days available if requested.

item.title: Curso de Apnea!
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description:
Deje de soñar con el mundo submarino y aprenda Apnea con nosotros! Nos comprometemos a brindarle la mejor experiencia de aprendizaje junto con PADI.
Precio: $5,000 pesos, mínimo 4 personas y máximo 6.
item.content:encoded:
El curso PADI Freediver consta de tres fases principales:

  • El desarrollo de conocimientos sobre los fundamentos del freediving
  • Sesión en aguas confinadas para aprender técnicas de Apnea así como apnea estática y dinámica. Objetivo – apnea estática de 90 segundos y apnea dinámica de 25 metros/80 pies.
  • Sesiones en aguas abiertas para practicar inmersión libre y freedives con peso constante. Objetivo – freedive con peso constante a 10 metros/30 pies.

Incluye:

  • Curso de 2 días
  • Fotos y videos bajo el agua
  • Materiales en línea y tarjeta de certificación
  • Instructor profesional PADI certificado de apnea
  • Bebidas y Snacks
  • Día adicional para apnea con tarifa especial si se solicita.
